name: Samurai Runner (Matheus vinicus)
description:
“Samurai Runner”. The player takes on the role of a brave samurai who is on the run from the evil skeletons that have taken over the world. The samurai is the last survivor of his clan and is determined to fight to the end to save his life.

The game starts in a dark and desolate landscape, with the skeletons in relentless pursuit of the samurai. The player's objective is to guide the samurai through a maze of obstacles and enemies, avoiding attacks and jumping over dangerous obstacles.

As the player progresses through the game, the difficulty level increases. Skeletons become more aggressive and appear at greater speed, while obstacles become more complex and difficult to overcome. The player must use all his skills to survive and advance through the game.

"Samurai Runner" is an exciting and challenging game that will test the player's reflexes and skills. If you're ready for this epic adventure, join the samurai in his desperate escape from the darkness and fight for his survival!
